00040 require_once($MODEL_PATH.'apache.php');
00041 
00042 class Apachelogs extends Apache
00043 {
00044     public $Name= 'apachelogs';
00045     
00046     public $LogFile= '/var/www/logs/access_log';
00047 
00048     function ParseLogLine($logline, &$cols)
00049     {
00050         global $Re_Ip;
00051     
00052         //10.0.0.11 - - [26/Sep/2009:03:03:45 +0300] "GET /symon/graph.php?61ea9e7cb820b19cc116fc5eb37490de HTTP/1.1" 200 31949
00053         //10.0.0.11 - - [26/Sep/2009:03:04:23 +0300] "GET /images/run.png HTTP/1.1" 304 -
00054         //10.0.0.11 - - [25/Sep/2009:20:05:54 +0300] "POST /snortips/conf.php HTTP/1.1" 200 11063
00055         //10.0.0.11 - - [08/Oct/2009:12:56:03 +0300] "GET / HTTP/1.1" 302 5
00056         $datetime= '\[(\d+\/\w+\/\d+):(\d+:\d+:\d+)\s*[\w+]*\]';
00057         $ip= "($Re_Ip)";
00058         $mtd= '(GET|POST|\S+)';
00059         $link= '(\S*)';
00060         $code= '(\d+)';
00061         $size= '(\d+|-)';
00062 
00063         $re= "/^$ip\s+.*\s+$datetime\s+\"$mtd\s+$link\s+HTTP\/\d+\.\d+\"\s+$code\s+$size$/";
00064         if (preg_match($re, $logline, $match)) {
00065             $cols['IP']= $match[1];
00066             $cols['Date']= $match[2];
00067             $cols['Time']= $match[3];
00068             $cols['DateTime']= $cols['Date'].' '.$cols['Time'];;
00069             $cols['Mtd']= $match[4];
00070             $cols['Link']= $match[5];
00071             $cols['Code']= $match[6];
00072             $cols['Size']= $match[7];
00073             if ($cols['Size'] == '-') {
00074                 $cols['Size']= 0;
00075             }
00076             return TRUE;
00077         }
00078         else if ($this->ParseSyslogLine($logline, $cols)) {
00079             $cols['DateTime']= $cols['Date'].' '.$cols['Time'];
00080             $cols['IP']= _('NA');
00081             return TRUE;
00082         }
00083         return FALSE;
00084     }
00085 
00086     function PostProcessCols(&$cols)
00087     {
00088         // Exclude encoded image names, but include submenus
00089         preg_match('/^([^?]+(\?submenu=.*|)).*$/', $cols['Link'], $match);
00090         $cols['Link']= $match[1];
00091     }
00092 
00093     function GetDateRegexp($date)
00094     {
00095         global $MonthNames;
00096         
00097         // Match all years
00098         $re= '.*';
00099         if ($date['Month'] == '') {
00100             $re= '.*\/'.$re;
00101         }
00102         else {
00103             $re= $MonthNames[$date['Month']].'\/'.$re;
00104             if ($date['Day'] == '') {
00105                 $re= '.*\/'.$re;
00106             }
00107             else {
00108                 $re= $date['Day'].'\/'.$re;
00109             }
00110         }
00111         return $re;
00112     }
00113 }
